tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
  appliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  energy_consumed FLOAT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    log_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES smart_home_appliances(appliance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT,
    consumption_date DATE,
    consumption_value INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES SmartHomeAppliances(appliance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    consumption_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT REFERENCES appliances(appliance_id),
    location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id),
    consumption_date DATE NOT NULL,
    energy_used DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE AppliancesInRooms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES SmartHomeAppliances(appliance_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES Rooms(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserApplianceHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    appliance_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (appliance_id) REFERENCES SmartHomeAppliances(appliance_id)
);
